text: 12.45: Hi 6.4; 2 Pi 2.20-22Ana ana gangip, taagi ŋgɨp, harigi harathɨgi ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi, mbe guigira ana kambarav tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui ntɨɨri ma, ana mben kuv zɨrga. Ana mbe kuv zɨv, mbe mba phena vhen ŋgirgɨp, mba phena vhen kɨrga. Mba guma, ana fharav maneŋ mbatɨgia kegi, ana ntigem, ana guigira za mbatɨgirga. Kha khesharigi tɨvara kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi mbatɨgir hɨrga.”
